VelvetChoker.NAME: Death Knell Effect:
VelvetChoker.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] and reset this relic's counter to #b0.

SneckoEye.NAME: Death Knell Effect:
SneckoEye.DESCRIPTION: Draw #b2 cards.  If you are not #yConfused, gain #yConfused.

HornCleat.NAME: Death Knell Effect:
HornCleat.DESCRIPTION: Reset this relic's counter to #b1 (if it has already been used, reactivate it)

DuVuDoll.NAME: Death Knell Effect:
DuVuDoll.DESCRIPTION: Gain #b1 #yStrength for each #rCurse in your Deck.

Girya.NAME: Death Knell Effect:
Girya.DESCRIPTION: Gain #b1 #yStrength for each time you have #yLifted.

CaptainsWheel.NAME: Death Knell Effect:
CaptainsWheel.DESCRIPTION: Reset this relic's counter to #b1 (if it has already been used, reactivate it)

GamblingChip.NAME: Death Knell Effect:
GamblingChip.DESCRIPTION: Discard any number of cards, then draw that many cards.

Toolbox.NAME: Death Knell Effect:
Toolbox.DESCRIPTION: Choos #b1 of #b3 random Colorless cards and add the chosen card into your hand.

Sling.NAME: Death Knell Effect:
Sling.DESCRIPTION: If this is an Elite fight, gain #b2 #yStrength.

Akabeko.NAME: Death Knell Effect:
Akabeko.DESCRIPTION: The next #yAttack you play this combat deals #b8 additional damage.

CentennialPuzzle.NAME: Death Knell Effect:
CentennialPuzzle.DESCRIPTION: The next time you lose HP this combat, draw #b3 cards.

Pantograph.NAME: Death Knell Effect:
Pantograph.DESCRIPTION: If this is a Boss fight, heal #b25 HP.

CultistMask.NAME: Death Knell Effect:
CultistMask.DESCRIPTION: This turn, you feel more talkative.

Enchiridion.NAME: Death Knell Effect:
Enchiridion.DESCRIPTION: Add a random #yPower card into your hand.  It costs #b0 for this turn.

Necronomicon.NAME: Death Knell Effect:
Necronomicon.DESCRIPTION: The next #yAttack you play this turn that costs #b2 or more is played twice.

WarpedTongs.NAME: Death Knell Effect:
WarpedTongs.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade a random card in your hand.

Motivation.NAME: Death Knell Effect:
Motivation.DESCRIPTION: The next time you #yBury a card this turn, gain [E] .
